content.text: Pretty good. I just started my own business.
That's awesome! What kind of business?
I started a dog walking business. I love dogs and I love being outside.
That's great! I love animals too. I'm a dog walker too.
Really? That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about being a dog walker?
I love getting to know the dogs and their owners. It's so rewarding to see the dogs happy and healthy.
I totally agree. It's also really great exercise!
Yes it is! I love being outside and getting some fresh air.
Me too! Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes I love to dye my hair different colors. I like to keep it fun and bright.
That's awesome! I've never dyed my hair before.
You should try it! It's so much fun. I also love photography.
That's another great hobby! I love taking pictures of nature.
Me too! I love capturing the beauty of the world.
It's so nice to meet you.
You too! It's great to chat with someone who shares some of my interests.
